text_new_user_created.en:
A user account has been created for %USERID%.
To enter more information about yourself, follow the link.

text_create_new_user.en:
You are about to create an account I JANUS with the username %USERID%.
Push enter to create account

header_no_new_user.en: Can not create new user account

text_no_new_user.en: Automatic creation of new users is not supported on this instance of JANUS.

text_export_federation_desc.en: Choose a filter and choose if you want download or view in xml or text format

text_idp&sp-all.en: All identity Providers (IdP) and all service Providers (SP)

text_saml20-all.en: Alle SAML Identity Providers (IdP) and all SAML Service Providers (SP)

text_shib13-all.en: All Shib Identity Providers (IdP) and all Shib Service Providers (SP)

error_entity_not_url.en: The connection ID should be a valid URL complying to the RFC1738.</br />Only alphanumeric characters and $&'-_.,;=+!*()~/% may be used in entity ids.

error_required_metadata_missing.en: The following metadatafields are required but not present.

error_required_metadata_missing_entity.en: The following metadatafields are required but not present in %ENTITY%.

error_auth_user.en: Unknown error when authorizating the user to access JANUS

tab_disable_consent_help.en: Mark all services that you want to disable consent for.

tab_remote_entity_help_saml20-idp.en: Mark services that your users are not allowed to access.

tab_remote_entity_help_saml20-sp.en: Mark those identity providers which are not allowed to acces your service.

text_entities_help.en: Click on a service provider or identity provider to administer connections

add_metadata_from_url_desc.en: Get metadata from a URL. This URL must target a xml file with the metadatas of the entity.

error_import_metadata_permission.en: You do not have permission to import metadata.

error_import_metadata_url.en: Can not import. Invalid metadata URL.

error_entityid_no_match.en: Entity id in metadata do not match

error_metadata_not_parsed_due_expiration.en: Error when importing metadata due metadata are expired

error_not_valid_saml20.en: Error when parsing imported metadata. Not valid SAML 2.0 metadata

export_text.en: Metadata is displayed in XML format (SAML) or own dictionary format simpleSAMLphp. Also you have the functionality to send the metadata to the administrator of Janus.

export_intro.en: Here you can see your metadata

tab_entities_federation_exporting.en: Click here to export the metadata set of entities of the federation

tab_entities_federation_status.en: Click here to validate the entities of the federation

error_no_access.en: You do not have access to this resource

error_user_not_created_due_params.en: The user was not created. Verify that the user ID and type are valid

install_tables_created.en: The following tables have been created

install_users_created.en: The follwoing users have been created

install_add_authsource.en: You need to add the following to <tt>authsources.php</tt> for Mailtoken auth source to work

install_delete_install.en: REMEMBER to delete the install directory. Your installation can be overwritten.

install_error_db.en: An error has occured. Please checkk that the connection to the database and configuration is correct and try again.

install_instruction.en:
When you hit `install` all database tables for JANSU will be created including tables for the Mailtoken auth source. A configuration file will be created as well. You must manually include the configuration file into your local installation of SimpleSAMLphp. configuration for the Mailtoken auth source will also be created.

NB This installer can only use a MySQL database.

You also need to fill out admin infomation. A admin account will then be created.

cert_not_found.en: Certificate not found in entity metadata

missing_require_metadata.en: The following metadatafields of the entity are required but not present:
